title: Modeling a Non-Periodic Context-Logarithmic Function, Part C

content.question: Part C The makers of the video game reported that daily sales of the video game decreased each day after <math alttext="t equals 91"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>91</mn> </math>. Explain why the error in the model <math alttext="G"> <mi>G</mi> </math> increases after <math alttext="t equals 91"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>91</mn> </math>.

frqParts.text: Part C The makers of the video game reported that daily sales of the video game decreased each day after <math alttext="t equals 91"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>91</mn> </math>. Explain why the error in the model <math alttext="G"> <mi>G</mi> </math> increases after <math alttext="t equals 91"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>91</mn> </math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Support conclusions or choices with a logical rationale or appropriate data.
